name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Roger WELSHANS; COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Roger WELSHANS, Cross Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Roger WELSHANS. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Roger WELSHANS, Cross Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 20th day of May, 1991, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The matter is to be consolidated with Com. v. Voshall, 525 Pa. 599, 575 A.2d 565 (1990). The Cross-Petition is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
591 A.2d 710
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Roger WELSHANS. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Roger WELSHANS, Cross Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 20, 1991.
